html: Thee. The little band of Judas was sincerely attached to the Lord, 2 Machabees i. 3.—Sinned. This excited thy anger. Yet thou wilt shew mercy. Sin is often put for punishment. (Calmet)—Vau means also, "for, and, yet." Protestants, "for we have sinned." But we follow St. Jerome and the Vulgate. (Worthington)
